titleStmt.title: A proclamation by his Excellencie the Lord Generall, concerning free-quarter.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Playford, and are to be sold at his shop in the Inner Temple,

notesStmt.note: By virtue of counterfeit passes certain persons take free quarter. Soldiers are to take free quarters through a commission officer, who shall show his commission and give his name. Offenders to be imprisoned and tried by court martial -- Cf. Steele.
Dated at end: Given under my Hand and Seal in Queens-street the 20. day of February, 1648.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "1648"; 9 in imprint date crossed though.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Inner Temple
